name: Buccaneers! (itch)
description:
Buccaneers!

Sink as many pirates as you can - either on your own, or with a mate in couch co-op.

Controls

Gamepads: any analog stick moves the ship, any button fires the cannons. 
Keyboards: keys can be configured on the Settings page. The default mapping:

Player 1
Up: 'w' or 'i'  
Down: 's' or 'k'  
Left: 'a' or 'j'  
Right: 'd' or 'l'  
Fire: 'Tab' or 'Space'  

Player 2
Up: 'Up arrow' or '8' 
Down: 'Down arrow' or '5'  
Left: 'Left arrow' or '4'  
Right: 'Right arrow' or '6'  
Fire: 'Enter' or '.'  

Assets
Graphic assets: https://www.kenney.nl/  
Sound effects: https://freesound.org/
